title: Delicious chicken and chorizo paella
ingredients: ['100g chorizo, sliced', '1 large onion, diced', '2 chicken breast fillets, chopped', '2 teaspoons turmeric', '2 teaspoons smoked paprika', '120g paella rice', '600ml chicken stock', '1 red pepper, sliced', '80g frozen petit pois', 'black pepper, to taste']
